title: Pool Party Taric needs a TOGGLE!!!
body:
Let's face it, when you first looked at that pool party Taric splash art you just saw that hunky beast of a shirtless man.  And then you look at the model and you're like, why is he so covered up O.o  And then you see his recall animation and you're like YASSSSSS!!!!! Take it off!!!!!  I have heard many people suggest it but this skin should have a taunt toggle or something added that allows you to remove his jacket.

This skin is almost perfect.  The animations are stunning, the ult sun(glasses) are adorable. I love the implementation of the life preserver as one of his crystals (this should be a bit bigger though it looks tiny).  But the one big drawback is the jacket.  From any angle aside from facing downward Taric looks super covered up, and this is Taric, probably one of the most vain people in the universe (aside from Aurelion).  He knows he's gorgeous, he knows he has an amazing body, he would be showing it off at all times in a bathing suit scenario.  Not to mention the fact that he has a flawless tan and wearing a jacket constantly would distort it, thereby distorting his beauty and causing a mental breakdown O.O  (tan lines are evil incarnate)

Perhaps I'm in the minority here but Taric is my favourite eye candy and although I will be buying the skin no matter what, I do think the toggle idea or even just removing the jacket all together would be much more appealing.  When I first saw the art I was crazy excited because the jacket was not the focus and it really showed off Taric's great body, but the in game model feels like the jacket is the main focus and it's pretty boring.  Plus having the highlight of your game being when you recall because it is the only time you get to remove that damn jacket covering up your ideal man, it feels bad :'(

FREE the TARIC!!!!! CREATE the TOGGLE!!!

EDIT; We've received an official reply from Riot that they have no intention of creating a toggle despite the voting poll showing vastly in favor.  This thread will now represent the people who want the ugly and hideous and cruel and evil jacket covering our beloved pool party Taric to be removed completely and burned in the fires of righteousness!

Please feel free to leave your opinions and position on this below.

http://grabilla.com/0661d-15b88daa-2fc6-457d-9fa9-986eea0493f3.png

replies.body:
Hey folks, 

Wanted to jump in here since there's been a bunch of talk around Pool Party Taric and him having a toggle for various actions in this skin. 

Part of this is due to my less than clear wording on the PBE post - 

> **New model and texture:** Lifeguard outfit, complete with a jacket that can be taken off!

By this, I was referring to - 

> **New recall animation:** Taric takes off his jacket and hops into the pool!

I've since updated the post to better reflect what was meant to be said - 

> **New model and texture**: Lifeguard outfit! 

**The TL;DR is**, I apologize for the poor wording that may have gotten some players' hopes up for a toggle, but we do not have plans to add any sort of toggle for Pool Party Taric.
Didn't you guys add a toggle to Night Hunter Rengar with the hood after community feedback though? Isn't this the same thing?
We have done a lot based on community feedback, but this isn't something we plan to change. It's pretty distracting in regards to gameplay.
Out of curiosity, how do you all consider it distracting?
Having a large, red,  jacket being tossed out in lane is a distraction.

I don't think the toggle would need to be like the recall, just a short thing like rengar would be fine.  On that note what is to stop Taric from just spamming recall and it not being distracting in the EXACT same way? Your logic here is kinda flawed.

I feel like this could have been easily worked into the recall anyways, like the first time you complete the recall Taric's jacket is removed and stays off until you complete the recall again, then it is back on until he recalls again.  That way you could have a consistent changing mechanic that isn't distracting outside of the recall and lets the people buying this skin have their fanservice in a fun way.

In that case is there any chance of the jacket being removed all together? It feels like it's literally just there to make the recall animation.  I don't even really understand why it was put on the model to begin with, the majority of the posts wanting a Taric Pool Party skin was to show off his new model and his body. And his crystals along with the megaphone more than represent his lifeguard role.
Unfortunately not - it was just meant to make the recall animation a bit more interesting.
Why is it that an annoyingly large amount of your posts end in 'we do not have any plans to...'?
It's the nicest way I have of saying no, to be honest. I feel bad that we aren't able to change everything players are requesting.

I feel like if you guys gave us a chance to provide feedback earlier on in the process of these skins development then we could actually have things changed to better suit the desires of the people specifically interested in these types of skins.  I would gladly have had this be a higher tier skin and pay for it to actually have the functions that a lot of us have expressed we desired.  Because we only get to see it after it's on pbe, nothing we want can actually be implemented at that point.
Would you prefer for her to lie?

What would it take to make Tarics outfit a toggle?
I can imagine scavenging the toggle for DJ Sona, and then an animation to make it happen.
The amount of tech, and work required would probably bump the skin price up a tier or two, but honestly what would it take?

Yes I'm serious.

It's an animation, and something that's attached to a recall animation. It isn't set up to be a toggle to begin with. It would require a bit of work to transform it into a toggle. We were also against it because it would be distracting in a gameplay setting.

>Distracting in a gameplay setting

Does that mean that you don't do toggles anymore? That's not what you guys used to think. Or is this only about Taric?
Specifically Taric in this case. PROJECT: Ashe has a hood that automatically toggles.

Legendary Ashe skin hype!

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
#Release the Beast.
They made the thing with Night Hunter Rengar so they should do it the same with Pool Party Taric

My name needs to be changed. I miss the old questionably human and questionably gay Taric that I always knew and loved. Now he just looks like a Disney movie hero. I like his new kit. The absence of the majestic version of Taric though has scarred my soul. Goodbye my beautiful prince.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OwPXfMVmfCc/maxresdefault.jpg
His new voice is also an insult to everyone that's ever put effort into anything before.
It's the hardest I've ever seen Yuri Lowenthal try to not sound like Yuri Lowenthal.
{{champion:75}} - **Tell me about it.**
Super thumbs up
It's okay little one, just rest your head on Taric's manly chest, he will keep you safe.

I will as I always have.

http://i.imgur.com/6lMKVDZ.jpg

This new guy is an impostor

> [{quoted}](name=Tarics Gemstones,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bK6lYtit,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-29T09:17:19.723+0000)
>
> My name needs to be changed. I miss the old questionably human and questionably gay Taric that I always knew and loved. Now he just looks like a Disney movie hero. I like his new kit. The absence of the majestic version of Taric though has scarred my soul. Goodbye my beautiful prince.
> 
> https://i.ytimg.com/vi/OwPXfMVmfCc/maxresdefault.jpg

This is so true for me too! I actually really enjoyed old taric, it can actually be considered that I mained him for a bit. I just found him fun, especially top lane taric, my best memory is getting a quadra kill as that. But the new taric just isn't the same so I don't play him as much if at all anymore. I miss his majesticness.

Yes! Majestic seems to always be the word people will use when describing old Taric. Now he is just too human. He is too goofy and blatant too. That subtleness and that old voice over. *sniff* WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Am I the only person that doesn't like the skin? The items floating behind him are so distracting and his skin looks red and sunburned. It's a shame because I love the skill visual effects and the splash art is awesome but Im not a fan of the actual model. :/

Still voting to free my man! He deserves it! WOOOOOO!

Honestly, I feel like the jacket kinda adds to the issue, it's colouring is slightly different to the shorts and doesn't really compliment his tan.  When the jacket is removed in the recall the skin looks like it fits a lot better, but I am BIASED!!!  

Also I like the life preserver but for me it feels too small, usually they are sized so that you can have your head through it but I don't think you could get Mundo's head through that thing with all the butter in the world, and lets face it...he's probably the one drowning.
Mundo breathes when he pleases!

Additionally, his hair seems strangely stiff and its really apparent in blonde. Surely Rito has the tech to make it a gorgeous flowing mane!

I really wanted to like the skin, but the way the model is I don't really care for it and that makes me sad. :C

> [{quoted}](name=Quort,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=bK6lYtit,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-29T19:34:42.393+0000)
>
> Am I the only person that doesn't like the skin? The items floating behind him are so distracting and his skin looks red and sunburned. It's a shame because I love the skill visual effects and the splash art is awesome but Im not a fan of the actual model. :/
> 
> Still voting to free my man! He deserves it! WOOOOOO!

We're actually doing a pass on his skin tone / hair to look more like the splash, since we also felt he looked sunburnt!
Riot Time Wizard... you are an awesome person! Thank you for spreading your awesomeness to the Rift! :D

When they said that his coat could be taken off, that's what I thought they meant.

I feel personally betrayed that they don't already have this in there.
I think this was the case for most people, they made it seem like it would be a core function of the skin, finding out it's only on the recall is kinda disappointing.
I would prefer to have this skin be him in a speedo ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° ){{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

I think a lot of the posts about a pool party skin for Taric were asking for him to be in a speedo.  People want Taric to be sexy and pool party was the perfect opportunity for this, the jacket just ruins the fun, BURN IT ALIVE!!!!
